item.title: Stampede at India’s Maha Kumbh Mela Hindu Festival: Many Feared Dead
item.description: People were trampled as pilgrims at the Maha Kumbh Mela, one of the world’s biggest gatherings, gathered where the Ganges and Yamuna Rivers meet, offi...

item.title: Student Threatened With Expulsion Over Social Posts Gets $250,000 Settlement
item.description: The University of Tennessee threatened to expel Kimberly Diei over posts the school said were inappropriate. She sued on First Amendment grounds.

item.title: Menendez Co-Conspirator Sentenced to 7 Years as Ex-Senator Awaits Fate
item.description: Robert Menendez, a former senator from New Jersey, faces a potentially lengthy prison sentence after his conviction on federal corruption charges.
